name: Blossom
description:
With Blossom you can share your video research in minutes, making collaboration easy and effective.


Our plugin allows you to embed videos and media as editable artboards so you can inspire your team with a rich understanding of user needs.


With the free plugin you can:

  • Embed 100 videos directly into Figma from leading industry platforms such as YouTube, Loom and Vimeo.
  • Copy paste media links from Twitter and have them be converted into editable artboards for better flexibility when presenting your customer findings.


With a Professional subscription you can:

  • Upload your recordings to Blossom to transcribe and make quick edits to showcase key insights
  • Keep your shared research recordings secure with password-protected access
  • One place to manage all your video user research and recordings
  • Curate your insights into playable highlight reels to captivate your stakeholders and team
  • Publish presentations with playable videos directly from Figma that you can then share with your team via shareable links


Get in touch

Blossom is expanding everyday. Have a question or idea for us? Send it over to: team@tryblossom.io.
